pages.title: Somnium Usage Upgrade
pages.text: The Somnium Usage Upgrade essence is a powerful tool that allows the user to conserve energy when using spells, artifacts, or rings. This essence can be consumed 3 to 5 times to maximize its effectiveness and help the user endure longer in battle or other situations.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: The Somnium Usage Upgrade can be crafted in a Somnium Infuser using loran energy and somnium as ingredients.

pages.heading: Recipe
pages.text1: Place Somnium and loran energy in the upper input slots.
pages.text2: To craft Somnium Usage Uprgade, place the required items in the test tubes on the left and right.
